scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.package: npm run build:frontend && cd backend && npm run package
scripts.package:win: npm run build:frontend && cd backend && npx pkg . --target node18-win-x64 --output ../dist/modlocalizer-windows.exe
scripts.package:mac: npm run build:frontend && cd backend && npx pkg . --target node18-macos-x64 --output ../dist/modlocalizer-macos
scripts.package:linux: npm run build:frontend && cd backend && npx pkg . --target node18-linux-x64 --output ../dist/modlocalizer-linux
